title: Miso halibut with teriyaki green vegetables
description: James Martin combines Japanese and Chinese ingredients to make a stunning marinated fish dish served with flavour-packed greens.
ingredients: 4 x 150-200g/5½-7oz fillet of halibut, skin on, pin-boned
2cm/¾in knob fresh root ginger finely sliced
750g/1lb 10oz Chinese greens, such as black cabbage (cavolo nero) or bok choi
